summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 56th Avenue Southwest from approximately 106th feet north of West Dakota Street to Hillcrest Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys, and easements by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same as authorized by Ordinance No. 79414, creating Local Improvement District No. 5957, and amending Section 2 of said Ordinance to provide for additional funds.
